Title: June 2014
Content: 27*p44487a02728* (d) (i) the table below shows adaptations of the ethiopian wolf that enable it to survive in its mountain habitat.  place a cross (8) in the table that correctly describes whether the adaptation is behavioural, anatomical or physiological.(3)adaptationbehaviouralanatomicalphysiologicalsmall sharp teeth widely-spaced to cope with small prey narrow snout to fit into small gaps when hunting small preyhunting alone, as prey are too small to share with other wolves  *(ii) suggest how natural selection has led to the evolution of this species of wolf, adapted for life in the mountains of ethiopia.(4)(total for question 8 = 12 marks)total for paper = 80 marks
